p: A large and diverse fungal library is powerful in discovering new drugs. To achieve this goal, we collected samples globally. Current collection includes samples from Kenya, Myanmar, USA, and China. We received about 2395 soil samples and 2324 plant samples. We collected the whole plant or separated plant parts such as roots, stems, leaves, flowers, fruits, or various combinations of components. The samples were from 36 regions, including Nairobi in Kenya, 10 regions in the United States, Yangon in Myanmar, and 24 districts in China ( Table 2). The collection places cover various climate zones.
